issue.title: [R] [CI] Confirm that our sanitizer jobs are as close to CRAN as possible
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14537](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14537). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Here are the setups:
https://www.stats.ox.ac.uk/pub/bdr/memtests/README.txt

We do each (gcc-\*SAN, clang-\*SAN, and valgrind) slightly differently, can (should?) we unify those? What upstream additions/changes might we want or need to do that?
